amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to allocate funding for administrative costs at the VA to ensure providers at VA health facilities complete a continuing medication course in pain management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
